question: Print your name N times using recursion.
Print numbers from 1 to N using recursion.
Print numbers from N to 1 using recursion.
Calculate the sum of the first N numbers using recursion.
Calculate the factorial of N using recursion.
Reverse an array using recursion.
Check if a string is a palindrome using recursion.
Generate all subsequences of a string/array.
Surprise! A medium recursion problem.
Generate all permutations of a string/array.
N-Queens: Place N queens on an NÃ—N chessboard so that no two queens attack each other.
sampleOutput: All distinct solutions for the 4-queens puzzle.

question: Sudoku Solver: Write a program to solve a Sudoku puzzle by filling the empty cells.
Rat in a Maze: Find a path for a rat to go from source to destination in a maze.
sampleInput: A binary matrix representing the maze.

question: Word Search: Given a 2D board and a word, find if the word exists in the grid.
Combination Sum I: Find all unique combinations in candidates where the candidate numbers sum to target.
Combination Sum II: Find all unique combinations that sum to target (each number may only be used once).
Subset Sum I: Find all subsets of a given set of integers that sum up to a given value.
Subset Sum II: Find all unique subsets (the power set) from a collection of integers that might contain duplicates.
Palindrome Partitioning: Partition a string such that every substring of the partition is a palindrome.
Surprise! A hard backtracking problem.
